episodes.title: E151 The Brixton Prophet
episodes.description:
A plain-looking flat in Brixton hid one of the UK’s most disturbing cults. Led by a self-proclaimed prophet named Comrade Bala, the group kept three women in psychological and physical captivity for decades. Among them? Katy Morgan-Davies—born into the cult, denied her identity, and raised under the crushing belief that love, freedom, and even sunlight were punishable offenses.
This Stormy Willow episode unpacks Katy’s haunting story, from brainwashing and abuse to escape and survival—with respect, realism, and a touch of “WTF.  #StormyWillowPodcast   #KatyMorganDavies  #TheGirlInTheWindow  #FromCaptivityToFreedom  

shout out to:
Creator: Danielle Kirsty
 Watch here:
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TeZV52F8RMU

episodes.title: E133 WOFF - Word of Faith Fellowship - The Church that Preys
episodes.description: In this episode, we dive into the real-life horror show of Word of Faith Fellowship (WOFF)—a cult masquerading as a church in Spindale, NC. Led by Jane Whaley, WOFF has been accused of blasting prayers (aka exorcisms on steroids), forced labor, and complete mind control. Would you rather spend a night in a haunted house or a week at WOFF? 👀👻
